about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the feel of a classic RPG without assembling a band of intrepid adventurers and setting off into the woods with our Dreamscapes: Fantasy Camp episode DLC available through Ambient Channels.

Sit back, kick off your +1 Boots of Walking and let the rail camera navigate you through the scene in Ambiance Mode. You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting so they'll cycle through automatically.

Yet if a more interactive experience is what you seek, behold! You may search for magic items and campsite staples located in the episode with the Hidden Objects game mode.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the feel of a classic RPG without assembling a band of intrepid adventurers and setting off into the woods with our Dreamscapes: Fantasy Camp episode DLC available through Ambient Channels.

Sit back, kick off your +1 Boots of Walking and let the rail camera navigate you through the scene in Ambiance Mode. You can also control the warp camera to manually jump from place to place in the scene or use the slideshow setting so they'll cycle through automatically.

Yet if a more interactive experience is what you seek, behold! You may search for magic items and campsite staples located in the episode with the Hidden Objects game mode.

This episode is part of the Ambient Channels: Collector's Pass 2020/2021
name: Ambient Channels: Dreamscapes - Fantasy Camp

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD R7 250x
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650Ti or AMD R7 260

short_description: With the Dreamscapes: Fantasy Camp episode DLC you can enjoy the feel of a classic RPG in both the Ambiance and Game modes. Travel passively through the scene via the rail camera in Ambiance Mode or search the camp for various magic and campsite items with the Hidden Objects game.
